mutf8 LOCAL mutf8

NAME

mjo_utf8_is_quote — determine if an UTF-8 character is a quote symbol

SYNOPSIS

#include <mutf8.h>

int
mjo_utf8_is_quote(int *const o_is_quote, struct mjo_utf8 const *const i_peek);

DESCRIPTION

Determine if an UTF-8 character is a quote symbol.

Following is a description of the arguments.

o_is_quote
pointer to an ‘int’ (boolean) indicator of whether or not i_peek is a UTF-8 quote symbol
i_peek
UTF-8 character to process

If o_is_quote is nil, it shall not be set.

If i_peek is nil, invalid or empty, it shall not be evaluated.

If i_peek is a quote symbol, the routine shall set the boolean indicator *o_is_quote to true. Otherwise, the routine shall set the indicator to false.

RETURN VALUES

If any of the arguments are invalid, the return code shall be MJO_FAIL and errno shall be set to EINVAL. Otherwise, the return code shall be MJO_OK and errno will remain unchanged.

NOTES

For a list of quote symbols, please refer to the source file:

${MJO_HOME}/src/mquote.c
July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
